code: import React from'react';import{withRouter}from'react-router-dom';import s from'./TeamSchedule.module.css';var TeamSchedule=function TeamSchedule(props){var TITLE1='Лига "'+props.league_name+'" '+props.year+' год';var TITLE2='Расписание команды "'+props.team_name+'"';var Data=null;if(props.teamSchedule.listSchedule!==null&props.teamSchedule.listSchedule!==undefined){Data=props.teamSchedule.listSchedule;}var filteredDataTeams=null;if(Data!==null&Data!==undefined){filteredDataTeams=Data.filter(function(teamSchedule){return(teamSchedule.awayTeam.name+teamSchedule.homeTeam.name).toLowerCase().includes(props.search.toLowerCase());});}var listItem='Нет данных';if(filteredDataTeams!==null&filteredDataTeams!==undefined){listItem=filteredDataTeams.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:s.item,key:item.competition.id},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:s.date_text},"\u0414\u0430\u0442\u0430:",item.utcDate)," \u0414\u043E\u043C: ",item.homeTeam.name,"  (\u0413\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0438:",item.awayTeam.name,") ");});}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:s.content},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:s.title},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,TITLE1),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,TITLE2)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",null,listItem));};export default withRouter(TeamSchedule);//teamSchedule.awayTeam.name+
